content.question: In the second sentence of the final paragraph, the author justifies his determination to “see in the signs of the time hope of humanity for peace” by

choices.label: gesturing to the unthinkable consequences of holding the opposite opinion
drawing attention to historical evidence that has previously been ignored
pointing out a flaw in the line of reasoning of those who disagree with him
questioning the moral integrity of those who disagree with him

content.answer: gesturing to the unthinkable consequences of holding the opposite opinion

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe the line of reasoning and explain whether it supports an argument's overarching thesis.
